title: Future Security
description: Envision and build the secure attachment foundation you want together.

questions.text: What does secure attachment look like in our future?
choices: Trusting fully even when apart
Feeling safe to be completely ourselves
Handling challenges as a united team
A deep sense of home in each other

therapeutic.rationale: Future security visions reveal attachment aspirations. Trusting-when-apart shows separation security; being-ourselves shows authenticity safety; united-challenges shows partnership strength; home-in-each-other shows deep belonging. Shared vision aligns your growth direction.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different future visions can both be pursued. Your visions may complementâ€”one wanting trust-when-apart while the other wants home-in-each-other can coexist.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared future vision aligns your growth trajectory. You're building toward the same secure attachment goals.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What does your ideal secure attachment future look like? What would it feel like? What steps would get you there?

questions.text: What's the most important foundation we're building?
choices: Unshakeable trust in our commitment
Freedom to be vulnerable without fear
Reliable repair after any conflict
Deep knowledge of each other's inner world

therapeutic.rationale: Foundation-building priorities reveal security-creating values. Unshakeable-trust addresses abandonment; vulnerability-freedom addresses emotional safety; reliable-repair addresses conflict fear; deep-knowledge addresses intimacy. What you're building determines what you'll have.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different foundation priorities can both be built. Multiple foundations strengthen the relationship. Work on both.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared foundation priority means aligned building. Focus your joint effort on your shared foundation.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What foundation are you building together? How are you building it? What would strengthen this foundation?

questions.text: What attachment milestone do I hope we'll reach?
choices: Never doubting your love for me
Complete comfort with both closeness and space
Navigating any conflict without fear of losing you
Being my fullest self and being fully loved

therapeutic.rationale: Milestone hopes reveal attachment goals. Never-doubting addresses trust anxiety; closeness-space comfort addresses flexibility; conflict-without-fear addresses security during stress; full-self-fully-loved addresses conditional love fears. These milestones are achievable with intentional work.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different milestones show different journeys. You may be working toward different destinations that can coexist.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared milestone hope aligns your path. You're working toward the same attachment achievement.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What attachment milestone do you hope for? What would achieving it feel like? What's one step toward it?

questions.text: How do I want to show up as a more securely attached partner?
choices: Trusting you without needing constant proof
Staying open even when I want to withdraw
Asking directly for what I need
Offering reassurance before you ask

therapeutic.rationale: Growth intentions reveal personal development direction. Trust-without-proof addresses testing; open-when-withdraw addresses avoidance; direct-asking addresses suppression; proactive-reassurance addresses attunement. Setting intentions supports actual change.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different growth intentions show different personal work. Support your partner's specific intention even when different from yours.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared growth intentions mean aligned personal development. You can work on this together.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: How do you want to grow as a partner? What would help you become this? What's one thing you could do this week?

questions.text: What's the greatest gift our secure attachment will give us?
choices: Freedom to take risks knowing you've got me
Peace that doesn't depend on everything being perfect
Deep joy from true connection
Resilience to weather any storm together

therapeutic.rationale: Secure attachment gifts reveal what you're working toward. Risk-taking-freedom shows secure base; imperfection-peace shows acceptance; connection-joy shows intimacy reward; storm-resilience shows partnership strength. These gifts are the reward of attachment work.
therapeutic.whenDifferent: Different anticipated gifts show different values. Both gifts can be yours with secure attachment.
therapeutic.whenSame: Shared anticipated gift aligns your motivation. You're working toward the same reward.
therapeutic.journalPrompt: What gift do you most look forward to from secure attachment? What will that feel like? How will it change your life?
